instructions: From any Home screen, tap the Camera icon. Tap the Menu icon. Tap the Settings icon from the Menu drop-down. Update the following settings as desired: Make-up level Image adjustments Crop Wide (16:9) Regular (4:3) Square (1:1) Grid (on/off) Geo-tag photos (on/off) Review duration No review 5 seconds 10 seconds No limit Self-timer (on/off) Storage SD card Phone storage Continuous shooting (on/off) Camera options Auto smile capture (on/off) Touch to capture (on/off) Shutter sound (on/off) Volume button options Volume Capture Zoom Save as camera Reset to default

From any Home screen, tap the Camera icon. Tap the Menu icon. Tap the Settings icon from the Menu drop-down. Update the following settings as desired: Crop Wide (16:9) Regular (4:3) Square (1:1) Make-up level Camera options Auto smile capture (on/off) Voice capture (on/off) Touch to capture (on/off) Lock focus during recording (on/off) Continuous shooting (on/off) Review duration No review 5 seconds 10 seconds No limit Self-timer (on/off) Image adjustments Video Quality Full HD (1920 x 1080) HD (1280 x 720) QVGA (320 x 240) MMS (176 x 144) General Settings Grid (on/off) Geo-tag photos (on/off) Shutter sound (on/off) Volume buttons options Storage SD card Phone storage Reset to default
From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Camera . Press the Menu key. Tap Settings . Tap Storage . Select the storage location: SD card Phone storage
From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Camera . Press the Menu key. Tap General settings . Tap Storage . Select the storage location: SD card Phone storage

From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Gallery . Navigate to and select the desired group of pictures. Press the Menu key. Tap DELETE . Select each picture/video you want to delete. A red X will appear over each picture/video to be deleted. Tap DELETE .
